Resource.title: Kals CrossChat with Discord & Tribes
Resource.message:
[B][U]Kill Feed[/U][/B]

Source: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi']Click Here[/URL]

[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Player Death Feed
[*]Tamed Dino Death Feed
[*]Notifications at top of screen
[*]Can display Weapon Name and Icon
[*]Can display just Weapon Icon
[*]Can display just Weapon Name
[*]Can display in chat box
[*]Can display attackers mounted dino name tag
[/LIST]

[B][U]Commands:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]/kfreload          -        reload config.json at runtime
[/LIST]

[B][U]Config:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]PlayerKillsEnabled          -        displays kill feed for pvp
[*]TamedDinoKillsEnabled          -       display kill feed for tamed dino death
[*]DisplayType        -       change the display message / icon values 0-3
[*]DisplayScale        -      the scale of the notification
[*]DisplayDelay       -      the amount of time to show the feed for
[*]DisplayColour     -      the chat / notification message colour values 0.0 - 1.0
[*]DisplayInChatbox      -      display the killfeed in chatbox
[*]Messages      -      these are the messages used by the plugin you can convert to your own language
[/LIST]

[B][U]DisplayType:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]0 = Display Weapon Icon and Name in Notification
[*]1 = Display Weapon Icon in Notification
[*]2 = Display Weapon Name in Notification
[*]3 = Dont display notification
[/LIST]

[B][U]Donate[/U][/B]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.

Resource.title: Kals CrossChat with Discord & Tribes
Resource.message:
[B][U]Kill Feed[/U][/B]

Source: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi']Click Here[/URL]

[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Player Death Feed
[*]Tamed Dino Death Feed
[*]Notifications at top of screen
[*]Can display Weapon Name and Icon
[*]Can display just Weapon Icon
[*]Can display just Weapon Name
[*]Can display in chat box
[*]Can display attackers mounted dino name tag
[/LIST]

[B][U]Commands:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]/kfreload          -        reload config.json at runtime
[/LIST]

[B][U]Config:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]PlayerKillsEnabled          -        displays kill feed for pvp
[*]TamedDinoKillsEnabled          -       display kill feed for tamed dino death
[*]DisplayType        -       change the display message / icon values 0-3
[*]DisplayScale        -      the scale of the notification
[*]DisplayDelay       -      the amount of time to show the feed for
[*]DisplayColour     -      the chat / notification message colour values 0.0 - 1.0
[*]DisplayInChatbox      -      display the killfeed in chatbox
[*]Messages      -      these are the messages used by the plugin you can convert to your own language
[/LIST]

[B][U]DisplayType:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]0 = Display Weapon Icon and Name in Notification
[*]1 = Display Weapon Icon in Notification
[*]2 = Display Weapon Name in Notification
[*]3 = Dont display notification
[/LIST]

[B][U]Donate[/U][/B]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.

Resource.title: Kals CrossChat with Discord & Tribes
Resource.message:
[B][U]Kill Feed[/U][/B]

Source: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi']Click Here[/URL]

[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Player Death Feed
[*]Tamed Dino Death Feed
[*]Notifications at top of screen
[*]Can display Weapon Name and Icon
[*]Can display just Weapon Icon
[*]Can display just Weapon Name
[*]Can display in chat box
[*]Can display attackers mounted dino name tag
[/LIST]

[B][U]Commands:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]/kfreload          -        reload config.json at runtime
[/LIST]

[B][U]Config:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]PlayerKillsEnabled          -        displays kill feed for pvp
[*]TamedDinoKillsEnabled          -       display kill feed for tamed dino death
[*]DisplayType        -       change the display message / icon values 0-3
[*]DisplayScale        -      the scale of the notification
[*]DisplayDelay       -      the amount of time to show the feed for
[*]DisplayColour     -      the chat / notification message colour values 0.0 - 1.0
[*]DisplayInChatbox      -      display the killfeed in chatbox
[*]Messages      -      these are the messages used by the plugin you can convert to your own language
[/LIST]

[B][U]DisplayType:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]0 = Display Weapon Icon and Name in Notification
[*]1 = Display Weapon Icon in Notification
[*]2 = Display Weapon Name in Notification
[*]3 = Dont display notification
[/LIST]

[B][U]Donate[/U][/B]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.

Resource.title: Kals CrossChat with Discord & Tribes
Resource.message:
[B][U]Kill Feed[/U][/B]

Source: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi']Click Here[/URL]

[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Player Death Feed
[*]Tamed Dino Death Feed
[*]Notifications at top of screen
[*]Can display Weapon Name and Icon
[*]Can display just Weapon Icon
[*]Can display just Weapon Name
[*]Can display in chat box
[*]Can display attackers mounted dino name tag
[/LIST]

[B][U]Commands:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]/kfreload          -        reload config.json at runtime
[/LIST]

[B][U]Config:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]PlayerKillsEnabled          -        displays kill feed for pvp
[*]TamedDinoKillsEnabled          -       display kill feed for tamed dino death
[*]DisplayType        -       change the display message / icon values 0-3
[*]DisplayScale        -      the scale of the notification
[*]DisplayDelay       -      the amount of time to show the feed for
[*]DisplayColour     -      the chat / notification message colour values 0.0 - 1.0
[*]DisplayInChatbox      -      display the killfeed in chatbox
[*]Messages      -      these are the messages used by the plugin you can convert to your own language
[/LIST]

[B][U]DisplayType:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]0 = Display Weapon Icon and Name in Notification
[*]1 = Display Weapon Icon in Notification
[*]2 = Display Weapon Name in Notification
[*]3 = Dont display notification
[/LIST]

[B][U]Donate[/U][/B]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.

Resource.title: Lethal ORP
Resource.message:
[B][U]Weekend Rates[/U][/B]

Source: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi']Click Here[/URL]

[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Set multiple multipliers to change over the weekend
[*]Display chatbox text when weekend rates enabled / disabled
[*]Display notification when weekend rate enabled / disabled
[*]Automatically reverts multipliers back to the normal settings after the weekend
[*]Customize message colours
[*]Customize messages
[*]Change MOTD over the course of the weekend
[/LIST]
[B][U]Multipliers Supported:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]XPMultiplier
[*]TamingSpeedMultiplier
[*]HarvestAmountMultiplier
[*]HarvestHealthMultiplier
[*]CraftXPMultiplier
[*]FishingLootQualityMultiplier
[*]BabyMatureSpeedMultiplier
[*]MateBoostEffectMultiplier
[*]MatingIntervalMultiplier
[*]MatingSpeedMultiplier
[*]EggHatchSpeedMultiplier
[*]LayEggIntervalMultiplier
[*]ResourcesRespawnPeriodMultiplier
[*]SupplyCrateLootQualityMultiplier
[*]StructureResistanceMultiplier
[/LIST]
Days have format [0-6]. Where 0 being a Sunday.
 
[B][U]Commands:[/U][/B]
/wrreload               -     Reload Config

[B][U]Installation:[/U][/B]
Please edit config.json before applying
You can leave the config values at 0 that you don't want to change!

[B][U]Donate[/U][/B]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.

Source: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi']Click Here[/URL]

[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Set multiple multipliers to change over the weekend
[*]Display chatbox text when weekend rates enabled / disabled
[*]Display notification when weekend rate enabled / disabled
[*]Automatically reverts multipliers back to the normal settings after the weekend
[*]Customize message colours
[*]Customize messages
[*]Change MOTD over the course of the weekend
[/LIST]
[B][U]Multipliers Supported:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]XPMultiplier
[*]TamingSpeedMultiplier
[*]HarvestAmountMultiplier
[*]HarvestHealthMultiplier
[*]CraftXPMultiplier
[*]FishingLootQualityMultiplier
[*]BabyMatureSpeedMultiplier
[*]MateBoostEffectMultiplier
[*]MatingIntervalMultiplier
[*]MatingSpeedMultiplier
[*]EggHatchSpeedMultiplier
[*]LayEggIntervalMultiplier
[*]ResourcesRespawnPeriodMultiplier
[*]SupplyCrateLootQualityMultiplier
[*]StructureResistanceMultiplier
[/LIST]
Days have format [0-6]. Where 0 being a Sunday.
 
[B][U]Commands:[/U][/B]
/wrreload               -     Reload Config

[B][U]Installation:[/U][/B]
Please edit config.json before applying
You can leave the config values at 0 that you don't want to change!

[B][U]Donate[/U][/B]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.

[URL='https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=J6NKDZVCH9RN4&source=url'][IMG]https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/GB/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif[/IMG][/URL]

[/LIST]
Days have format [0-6]. Where 0 being a Sunday.
 
[B][U]Commands:[/U][/B]
/wrreload               -     Reload Config

[B][U]Installation:[/U][/B]
Please edit config.json before applying
You can leave the config values at 0 that you don't want to change!

[B][U]Donate[/U][/B]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.

Resource.title: Lethal ORP
Resource.message:
[B][U]Weekend Rates[/U][/B]

Source: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi']Click Here[/URL]

[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Set multiple multipliers to change over the weekend
[*]Display chatbox text when weekend rates enabled / disabled
[*]Display notification when weekend rate enabled / disabled
[*]Automatically reverts multipliers back to the normal settings after the weekend
[*]Customize message colours
[*]Customize messages
[*]Change MOTD over the course of the weekend
[/LIST]
[B][U]Multipliers Supported:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]XPMultiplier
[*]TamingSpeedMultiplier
[*]HarvestAmountMultiplier
[*]HarvestHealthMultiplier
[*]CraftXPMultiplier
[*]FishingLootQualityMultiplier
[*]BabyMatureSpeedMultiplier
[*]MateBoostEffectMultiplier
[*]MatingIntervalMultiplier
[*]MatingSpeedMultiplier
[*]EggHatchSpeedMultiplier
[*]LayEggIntervalMultiplier
[*]ResourcesRespawnPeriodMultiplier
[*]SupplyCrateLootQualityMultiplier
[*]StructureResistanceMultiplier
[/LIST]
Days have format [0-6]. Where 0 being a Sunday.
 
[B][U]Commands:[/U][/B]
/wrreload               -     Reload Config

[B][U]Installation:[/U][/B]
Please edit config.json before applying
You can leave the config values at 0 that you don't want to change!

Resource.title: [GamingOGs] Discord Metrics
Resource.message:
!!!New Config Needed!!!

Now you can just leave the config values at 0 that you dont want to change
Start day and end day now configurable
Now the rates will be applied 10 seconds after the server starts up if falls within start / end date
Added StructureResistanceMultiplier
Added ToggleWeekendRates command

Resource.title: [GamingOGs] Command Logger
Resource.message:
[SIZE=6][B]Introduction[/B][/SIZE]

This mod facilitates a lot of advanced testing of creatures, bosses, items, caves etc.

[SIZE=6][B]Chat[/B][/SIZE]
[LIST]
[*][B]/health[/B]: Prints a summary report of nearby tamed dinos health status.
[/LIST]

[SIZE=6][B]Console[/B][/SIZE]
[LIST]
[*][B]health[/B]: Prints a summary report of nearby tamed dinos health status (via notification).
Example: Health


[*][B]SpawnTemplate <template key>[/B]: Spawn custom templated dinos defined in config.json.
Example: SpawnTemplate griffin


[*][B]ItemTemplate <template key>[/B]: Spawn custom templated items defined in config.json.
Example: ItemTemplate flak


[*][B]TeleportTo <location key>[/B]: Teleport to a custom location defined in config.json.
Example: TeleportTo redobi


[*][B]ArkGameTestingCommands.ReloadConfig[/B]: Reload updated templates and settings from config.json.
Example: ArkGameTestingCommands.ReloadConfig
[/LIST]

[B][SIZE=6][B]Installation[/B][/SIZE][/B]
[LIST=1]
[*]Install ARK Server API ([URL='http://arkserverapi.com/']http://arkserverapi.com[/URL]).
[*]Download and extract ImprovedCommands into ShooterGame\Binaries\Win64\ArkApi\Plugins.
[*]Optionally configure the plugin in config.json.
[/LIST]

[SIZE=6][B]Configuration[/B][/SIZE]

In the configuration file config.json you may do the following
[LIST]
[*]Enable/disable individual commands.
[*]Change the name of individual commands.
[*]Enable/disable the ARK Server API permission system for individual chat commands.
[/LIST]

[CODE=json]{
  "ItemTemplates": {
    "flak": {
      "items": [
        {
          "blueprints": [
              "Blueprint'/Game/PrimalEarth/CoreBlueprints/Items/Armor/Metal/PrimalItemArmor_MetalHelmet.PrimalItemArmor_MetalHelmet'",
              "Blueprint'/Game/PrimalEarth/CoreBlueprints/Items/Armor/Metal/PrimalItemArmor_MetalShirt.PrimalItemArmor_MetalShirt'",
              "Blueprint'/Game/PrimalEarth/CoreBlueprints/Items/Armor/Metal/PrimalItemArmor_MetalGloves.PrimalItemArmor_MetalGloves'",
              "Blueprint'/Game/PrimalEarth/CoreBlueprints/Items/Armor/Metal/PrimalItemArmor_MetalPants.PrimalItemArmor_MetalPants'",
              "Blueprint'/Game/PrimalEarth/CoreBlueprints/Items/Armor/Metal/PrimalItemArmor_MetalBoots.PrimalItemArmor_MetalBoots'"
          ],
          "quality": 10.0
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "Locations": {
     "redobi": {
         "x": -262528.094,
         "y": 241189.141,
         "z": -11191.670
     }
  },
  "SpawnTemplates": {
    "theriz_boss": {
      "count": 20,
      "radius": 1000.0,
      "blueprint": "Blueprint'/Game/PrimalEarth/Dinos/Therizinosaurus/Therizino_Character_BP.Therizino_Character_BP'",
      "saddleBlueprint": "Blueprint'/Game/PrimalEarth/CoreBlueprints/Items/Armor/Saddles/PrimalItemArmor_TherizinosaurusSaddle.PrimalItemArmor_TherizinosaurusSaddle'",
      "saddleArmor": 100.0,
      "imprint": 1.0,
      "ignoreAllWhistles": false,
      "ignoreAllyLook": false,
      "follow": false,
      "aggressionLevel": "passive",
      "facing": "outwards",
      "baseLevelHealth": 45,
      "baseLevelStamina": 25,
      "baseLevelOxygen": 25,
      "baseLevelFood": 25,
      "baseLevelWeight": 25,
      "baseLevelMeleeDamage": 45,
      "baseLevelMovementSpeed": 25,
      "tamedLevelHealth": 25,
      "tamedLevelStamina": 0,
      "tamedLevelOxygen": 0,
      "tamedLevelFood": 0,
      "tamedLevelWeight": 0,
      "tamedLevelMeleeDamage": 25,
      "tamedLevelMovementSpeed": 0,
      "items": [
        {
          "blueprint": "Blueprint'/Game/PrimalEarth/CoreBlueprints/Items/Consumables/PrimalItemConsumable_SweetVeggieCake.PrimalItemConsumable_SweetVeggieCake'",
          "quantity": 5,
          "count": 10
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}[/CODE]


[SIZE=6][B]Spawn template options[/B][/SIZE]

[B]Option:[/B] aggressionLevel
[B]Values:[/B] passive, neutral, aggressive, attackmytarget
[B]Default:[/B] passive

[B]Option:[/B] facing
[B]Values:[/B] forward, outwards, inwards
[B]Default:[/B] forward

Resource.title: PvP Cooldowns
Resource.message:
[SIZE=6][B]Introduction[/B][/SIZE]

Adds cross server chat support to ARK Survival Evolved servers using ARK Server API.

Currently only supports multiple servers on the same machine due to using the Windows PulseEvent Synchronization API ([URL]https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms684914(v=vs.85).aspx[/URL]).


[SIZE=6][B]Installation[/B][/SIZE]
[LIST=1]
[*]Install ARK Server API ([URL='http://arkserverapi.com/']http://arkserverapi.com[/URL]).
[*]Download and extract ImprovedCommands into ShooterGame\Binaries\Win64\ArkApi\Plugins.
[*]Optionally configure the plugin in config.json.
[/LIST]

[SIZE=6][B]Configuration[/B][/SIZE]

If this plugin is used together with ArkBot ([URL]https://github.com/tsebring/ArkBot[/URL]) configure each server with identical server- and cluster keys as in the ArkBot-configuration.

If not; each server should have a unique server key and the cluster key should be the same for all servers that are connected.

DatabasePath must be a valid path and the directory must exist. The plugin will not attempt to create the directory.

NamePattern controls the formatting of character names.

[LIST]
[*]{Name} [{ServerTag}]: Use server tag as a suffix.
[*][{ServerTag}] {Name}: Use server tag as a prefix.
[*]{Name}: Don’t show server tags.
[/LIST]
HideServerTagOnLocal may be set to false if you want server tags to be shown for chat messages coming from the local server (i.e. the one you are playing on).

[CODE=json]{
    "ServerKey": "server1",
    "ClusterKey": "cluster1",
    "ServerTag": "MAPNAME",
    "NamePattern": "{Name} [{ServerTag}]",
    "HideServerTagOnLocal": true,
    "DatabasePath": "C:\\ARK Servers\\ArkCrossServerChat.db"
}[/CODE]

[*]Download and extract ImprovedCommands into ShooterGame\Binaries\Win64\ArkApi\Plugins.
[*]Optionally configure the plugin in config.json.
[/LIST]

[SIZE=6][B]Configuration[/B][/SIZE]

If this plugin is used together with ArkBot ([URL]https://github.com/tsebring/ArkBot[/URL]) configure each server with identical server- and cluster keys as in the ArkBot-configuration.

If not; each server should have a unique server key and the cluster key should be the same for all servers that are connected.

DatabasePath must be a valid path and the directory must exist. The plugin will not attempt to create the directory.

NamePattern controls the formatting of character names.

[LIST]
[*]{Name} [{ServerTag}]: Use server tag as a suffix.
[*][{ServerTag}] {Name}: Use server tag as a prefix.
[*]{Name}: Don’t show server tags.
[/LIST]
HideServerTagOnLocal may be set to false if you want server tags to be shown for chat messages coming from the local server (i.e. the one you are playing on).

[CODE=json]{
    "ServerKey": "server1",
    "ClusterKey": "cluster1",
    "ServerTag": "MAPNAME",
    "NamePattern": "{Name} [{ServerTag}]",
    "HideServerTagOnLocal": true,
    "DatabasePath": "C:\\ARK Servers\\ArkCrossServerChat.db"
}[/CODE]

Resource.title: [GamingOGs] Statistics
Resource.message:
[B][U]Automatic Plugin Update Checker[/U][/B]
[ATTACH=full]310[/ATTACH]


Source: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi']Click Here[/URL]

[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Prints messages in server console when plugin updates are out
[*]Sends alerts to discord when new plugin updates are released
[*]Checks for plugin updates each 30 minutes
[*]notify's you every 24 hours about a specific plugin update needed via console / discord
[/LIST]

[B][U]Setup Discord Notifications:[/U][/B]
Google how to make a discord webhook once you done that edit config.json change the false to true then place your discord web hook url in the line below in-between the ""

[B][U]Donate[/U][/B]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.

[URL='https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=J6NKDZVCH9RN4&source=url'][IMG]https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/GB/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif[/IMG][/URL]

Resource.title: KalsCrossChat - Atlas Edition
Resource.message:
[B]PVP Scheduler
Source: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi']Click Here[/URL][/B]

[B]Features::[/B]
[LIST]
[*]Ability to Schedule PVP
[*]Ability to just block PVP
[*]Ability to just block player Vs Structure
[*]Ability to just block player Vs Tamed Dino or Tamed Dino vs Tamed Dino
[*]Ability to set custom messages per schedule
[*]Ability to set a start day and hour and end ones too
[/LIST]


[B]Information:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]Your server has to be a pvp server this will not work on pve.
[*]Please note, that it checks every minute meaning after launching your server it will take 1 minute to enable pvp if that's the same start hour + day you set in config
[/LIST]

[B]Days:[/B]

days are in 0-6 format
0 = Sunday
1 = Monday
2 = Tuesday
3 = Wednesday
4 = Thursday
5 = Friday
6 = Saturday

[B]Hours:[/B]

hours are in 0-23 format
0 = 00:00
1 = 01:00
2 = 02:00
23 = 23:00

[B]Console Commands:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]pvpreload    -    Reload the config.json
[/LIST]

[B][U]Donate[/U]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.[/B]

[B][URL='https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=J6NKDZVCH9RN4&source=url'][IMG]https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/GB/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif[/IMG][/URL][/B]

[B]Configuration:
By default the config is set to start on a Friday at 7 pm and end on a Sunday 9 pm for a pvp weekend[/B]

[B][SPOILER="Config Explanation"][CODE]
{  
   "PVPScheduler":{  
      "ServerName":"ServerNameHere",
      "NotifyServer":true, //message entire server with PVPEnabledMessage or PVPDisabledMessage message
      "LogPvpSwitchAtConsole":true, //log the switchs at server console
      "ProtectExplosiveMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">You can only detonate Explosives when PVP mode is enabled!.</>",
      "ProtectPlayersPVPOff":true,//protect players when our schedule ends
      "ProtectDinosPVPOff":true,//protect dinos when our schedule ends
      "ProtectStructuresPVPOff":true,//protect structures when our schedule ends
      "ProtectExplosivesPVPOff":true,//protect from explosives when our schedule ends
      "Days":[
         {  
            "StartDay":5,//the day the schedule starts
            "StartHour":19,//the hour the schedule starts
            "EndDay":0,//the day the schedule ends
            "EndHour":21,// the hour the schedule ends
            "ProtectPlayersPVPOn":false,//protect players when our schedule starts
            "ProtectDinosPVPOn":false,//protect dinos when our schedule starts
            "ProtectStructuresPVPOn":false,//protect structures when our schedule starts
            "ProtectExplosivesPVPOn":false,//protect from explosives when our schedule starts
            "PVPEnabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">PVP is Enabled!.</>",
            "PVPDisabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">PVP is Disabled!.</>"
         }
      ]
   }
}
[/CODE]
[/SPOILER][/B]

[B][SPOILER="Evening PVP Config (pvp one day then pve then pvp...)"]
[CODE]{
   "PVPScheduler":{
      "ServerName":"ServerNameHere",
      "NotifyServer":true,
      "LogPvpSwitchAtConsole":true,
      "ProtectPlayersPVPOff":true,
      "ProtectDinosPVPOff":true,
      "ProtectStructuresPVPOff":true,
      "ProtectExplosivesPVPOff":true,
      "Days":[
         {
            "StartDay":1,
            "StartHour":0,
            "EndDay":2,
            "EndHour":0,
            "ProtectPlayersPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectDinosPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectStructuresPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectExplosivesPVPOn":false,
            "PVPEnabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">PVP is Disabled!</>",
            "PVPDisabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">PVP is Enabled!</>"
         },
         {
            "StartDay":3,
            "StartHour":0,
            "EndDay":4,
            "EndHour":0,
            "ProtectPlayersPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectDinosPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectStructuresPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectExplosivesPVPOn":false,
            "PVPEnabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">PVP is Disabled!</>",
            "PVPDisabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">PVP is Enabled!</>"
         },
         {
            "StartDay":4,
            "StartHour":0,
            "EndDay":5,
            "EndHour":0,
            "ProtectPlayersPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectDinosPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectStructuresPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectExplosivesPVPOn":false,
            "PVPEnabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">PVP is Disabled!</>",
            "PVPDisabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">PVP is Enabled!</>"
         },
         {
            "StartDay":6,
            "StartHour":0,
            "EndDay":0,
            "EndHour":0,
            "ProtectPlayersPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectDinosPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectStructuresPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectExplosivesPVPOn":false,
            "PVPEnabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">PVP is Disabled!</>",
            "PVPDisabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">PVP is Enabled!</>"
         }
      ]
   }
}[/CODE]
[/SPOILER][/B]

[*]Ability to just block PVP
[*]Ability to just block player Vs Structure
[*]Ability to just block player Vs Tamed Dino or Tamed Dino vs Tamed Dino
[*]Ability to set custom messages per schedule
[*]Ability to set a start day and hour and end ones too
[/LIST]


[B]Information:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]Your server has to be a pvp server this will not work on pve.
[*]Please note, that it checks every minute meaning after launching your server it will take 1 minute to enable pvp if that's the same start hour + day you set in config
[/LIST]

[B]Days:[/B]

days are in 0-6 format
0 = Sunday
1 = Monday
2 = Tuesday
3 = Wednesday
4 = Thursday
5 = Friday
6 = Saturday

[B]Hours:[/B]

hours are in 0-23 format
0 = 00:00
1 = 01:00
2 = 02:00
23 = 23:00

[B]Console Commands:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]pvpreload    -    Reload the config.json
[/LIST]

[B][U]Donate[/U]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.[/B]

[B][URL='https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=J6NKDZVCH9RN4&source=url'][IMG]https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/GB/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif[/IMG][/URL][/B]

[B]Configuration:
By default the config is set to start on a Friday at 7 pm and end on a Sunday 9 pm for a pvp weekend[/B]

[B][SPOILER="Config Explanation"][CODE]
{  
   "PVPScheduler":{  
      "ServerName":"ServerNameHere",
      "NotifyServer":true, //message entire server with PVPEnabledMessage or PVPDisabledMessage message
      "LogPvpSwitchAtConsole":true, //log the switchs at server console
      "ProtectExplosiveMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">You can only detonate Explosives when PVP mode is enabled!.</>",
      "ProtectPlayersPVPOff":true,//protect players when our schedule ends
      "ProtectDinosPVPOff":true,//protect dinos when our schedule ends
      "ProtectStructuresPVPOff":true,//protect structures when our schedule ends
      "ProtectExplosivesPVPOff":true,//protect from explosives when our schedule ends
      "Days":[
         {  
            "StartDay":5,//the day the schedule starts
            "StartHour":19,//the hour the schedule starts
            "EndDay":0,//the day the schedule ends
            "EndHour":21,// the hour the schedule ends
            "ProtectPlayersPVPOn":false,//protect players when our schedule starts
            "ProtectDinosPVPOn":false,//protect dinos when our schedule starts
            "ProtectStructuresPVPOn":false,//protect structures when our schedule starts
            "ProtectExplosivesPVPOn":false,//protect from explosives when our schedule starts
            "PVPEnabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">PVP is Enabled!.</>",
            "PVPDisabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">PVP is Disabled!.</>"
         }
      ]
   }
}
[/CODE]
[/SPOILER][/B]

[B][SPOILER="Evening PVP Config (pvp one day then pve then pvp...)"]
[CODE]{
   "PVPScheduler":{
      "ServerName":"ServerNameHere",
      "NotifyServer":true,
      "LogPvpSwitchAtConsole":true,
      "ProtectPlayersPVPOff":true,
      "ProtectDinosPVPOff":true,
      "ProtectStructuresPVPOff":true,
      "ProtectExplosivesPVPOff":true,
      "Days":[
         {
            "StartDay":1,
            "StartHour":0,
            "EndDay":2,
            "EndHour":0,
            "ProtectPlayersPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectDinosPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectStructuresPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectExplosivesPVPOn":false,
            "PVPEnabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">PVP is Disabled!</>",
            "PVPDisabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">PVP is Enabled!</>"
         },
         {
            "StartDay":3,
            "StartHour":0,
            "EndDay":4,
            "EndHour":0,
            "ProtectPlayersPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectDinosPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectStructuresPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectExplosivesPVPOn":false,
            "PVPEnabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">PVP is Disabled!</>",
            "PVPDisabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">PVP is Enabled!</>"
         },
         {
            "StartDay":4,
            "StartHour":0,
            "EndDay":5,
            "EndHour":0,
            "ProtectPlayersPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectDinosPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectStructuresPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectExplosivesPVPOn":false,
            "PVPEnabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">PVP is Disabled!</>",
            "PVPDisabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">PVP is Enabled!</>"
         },
         {
            "StartDay":6,
            "StartHour":0,
            "EndDay":0,
            "EndHour":0,
            "ProtectPlayersPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectDinosPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectStructuresPVPOn":false,
            "ProtectExplosivesPVPOn":false,
            "PVPEnabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">PVP is Disabled!</>",
            "PVPDisabledMessage":"<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">PVP is Enabled!</>"
         }
      ]
   }
}[/CODE]
[/SPOILER][/B]

Resource.title: Kals Spyglass
Resource.message:
[B][SIZE=5][COLOR=rgb(235, 107, 86)]Warning You must use new config or copy the changes to existing ones![/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Fixed schedules now when pvp is schedueled the protection modes must be set to false in the Days array to allow pvp
[*]Added 4 new options to config these are the settings that are applyed when pvp shchedule ends i.e you generally set these opposite to what you have in the pvp Days scheldule:
[*]Renamed Config Names in Days array added PVPOn to the end of each protection mode
[/LIST]

Resource.title: Simple Dino Stats
Resource.message:
This plugin allows you to give only a certain console commands to other players.

[B]Chat Commands:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]/cheat [B]<Console Command>[/B] - Executes console command if player has enough permissions.            Example: [ICODE]/cheat infinitestats[/ICODE].
[/LIST]
[B]Permissions:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]Cheat.[I]<ConsoleCommand>[/I] -  [I]<ConsoleCommand>[/I] is any console command. For example: [ICODE]Cheat.God[/ICODE].
[/LIST]
[B]Dependencies:[/B]
[LIST]
[*][URL='https://arkserverapi.com/resources/permissions.12/']Permissions[/URL]
[/LIST]
[B]Logs:[/B]
[INDENT]All commands usages will be logged to the ARK default log file. It's also possible to enable logging to chat.[/INDENT]
[INDENT][B][/B][/INDENT]
Full list of console commands: [URL]https://ark.gamepedia.com/Console_Commands[/URL].

For example, if you want to allow all players from group 'Moderators' use only 'KickPlayer' and 'InfiniteStats' commands, you need to grant them these permissions: 'Cheat.KickPlayer' and 'Cheat.InfiniteStats'. [ICODE]Permissions.Grant Moderators Cheat.KickPlayer[/ICODE]
[ICODE]Permissions.Grant Moderators Cheat.InfiniteStats[/ICODE]

Resource.message:
[B][U]Game Config Manager[/U][/B]

Source: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi']Click Here[/URL]

[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]You can change server settings during runtime (GameUserSettings.ini)
[*]may have the ability to change Game.ini during runtime (needs testing)
[/LIST]

also please note this may not support every single setting if you find some that it does not support like new ones please let me know by replying or by pm thanks.

[B][U]Commands:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Chat Command /sreload
[*]Rcon Command sreload
[*]Console Command cheat sreload
[/LIST]
[B][U]Credits[/U][/B]
OwnProx
Michidu

Resource.title: ARK Token Bank
Resource.message:
[FONT=verdana][B][SIZE=7][COLOR=rgb(44, 130, 201)][U]Advanced Chat[/U][/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][/FONT]

[COLOR=rgb(226, 80, 65)][B][U][SIZE=5]-How to buy:[/SIZE][/U][/B][/COLOR]
[B][SIZE=5]if you would like to purchase this please pm me or leave a message at my profile ([URL='https://arkserverapi.com/members/ownprox.2/#profile-post-69']Click Here[/URL]) the forum buy now button is bugged.[/SIZE][/B]

[COLOR=rgb(250, 197, 28)][U][B]Ingame:[/B][/U][/COLOR]
[ATTACH=full]2120[/ATTACH]

[COLOR=rgb(250, 197, 28)][U][B]Cross Chat:[/B][/U][/COLOR]
[ATTACH=full]2222[/ATTACH]

[B][U]Website Widget:[/U][/B]
[ATTACH]308[/ATTACH]

[B][U]Discord WebHook:[/U][/B]
[ATTACH]307[/ATTACH]

[B][U]Hwid Info:[/U][/B]
Each license represents a physical machine, so if you have a 64 gb ram dedicated server with 6 ark servers running you only need to purchase 1 licence, Additional licensee's are required when using multiple physical hardware

[B][U]Are you Moving Host ?[/U][/B]
Not a problem send me a pm with the new hwid and I will have it updated, Most times within the hour but in some cases can take up to 24 hours depending on my availability.

[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Coloured Message based on permissions you can set colours to global, tribe and alliance (please refer to Permissions setup Plugin below)
[*]Coloured Message based on steamid (has a command so you can change your colour during play time also has cooldowns /msgcolour)
[*]Custom icon (must be a icon already in game url to a list of most provided below)
[*]Discord Support post ingame chat messages to discord channels 4 web hook urls available (local & global, admin, tribe, ally) you can choose which ones you want enabled
[*]Discord Bot !players command
[*]Discord Bot Relay discord messages to ingame chat
[*]Cross Server chat is achieved using no third party applications and is 100% stable
[*]Cross Server Chat Via Sockets (recommended method, far superior to other cross chats using database's due to the fact there is no i/o operations and its better than rcon implementation ark has)
[*]Cross Server Chat Via Rcon (includes colours, icons ect across your servers)
[*]Cross Server Chat Include Tribe name option
[*]Cross Server Chat Include map name option
[*]Cross Server Chat Map Name Override option
[*]Cross Server Chat is able to have a different colour map name in the users message
[*]Cross Server Chat Supports Global chat, Tags, Message Colours and Icons
[*]Permission Caching (for less sql calls and much better perf)
[*]Optional Instanced config files for servers using 1 set of dedicated server files for all servers
[*]Name Tags
[*]Using Permissions plugin you can make new permissions with specific colours for vips / donators on your server
[*]Option to override game default chat icon & colours (Global, Tribe, Local, Alley)
[*]Working Emoji's
[*]Website ingame ark chat widget
[*]Website widget fully configurable from size to looks
[*]Website widget automatically fetch's the data using rcon
[*]Website widget caches the data for x amount of seconds to prevent lagg
[*]Website widget will get users name / chat colour from ingame and display in that colour
[*]Website widget auto scrolls to bottom of chatbox
[*]Website widget has working smileys
[/LIST]

[B][U]Info:[/U][/B]
Hello and welcome to Advanced chat this plugin allows you to make custom chat groups and specify a message colour, tag and even icon for the people you add to the group it works using the permissions plugin so add the permissions plugin then create a permission then grant that permission then edit Advanced chat Config.json add your new permission setup the colours and start adding players to it and your good to go.

[B][U]Config Overview (Don't use as a actual config it will cause syntax errors because of the explanations):[/U][/B]
[URL]http://worldgunz.net/AC/config.php[/URL]

[B][U]Permissions Setup Plugin:[/U]
[URL]https://arkserverapi.com/resources/permissions.12/[/URL][/B]
To use permissions in Advanced chat you need to add this plugin and create the permissions you need in the plugin then in the config of Advanced chat you need to place the permission name you created to add a specific colour to it below some example configs exist by default all Admins are added to Admins Permission

[B][U]-Permission Example (Needed when adding new permissions)[/U]
First to add a VIP Colour do this one time below
cheat Permissions.AddGroup VIP
cheat Permissions.Grant VIP VIP[/B]

[B]Then each player you add do this
Permissions.Add <SteamID> VIP[/B]

[B]<SteamID> can be obtained at showmyadminmanager and simply click on a player then click a command click execute then click copy steam id and it will put it in the text box click in there press ctrl + a then press ctrl + c then close the admin manager and open the console type cheat Permissions.add then press c + v then type VIP then it should look like this cheat Permissions.add 745654747764743 VIP[/B]


[B][U]Discord Bot Setup:[/U][/B]
[URL]http://worldgunz.net/AC/DiscordBotSetup.html[/URL]

[B][U]Purchase Info:[/U][/B]
After payment please give me at least 1-48 hours to deliver the plugin and setup hwid info download link, This purchase comes with basic support if needed.

[B][U]Colours Configuration:[/U][/B]
to convert hex or rgb to a float colour go here: [URL]http://worldgunz.net/AC/ColourPicker.html[/URL]
and that's how it would look in config the 1.0 at the end is alpha so 0.5 would be half transparent

[B][U]Commands:[/U][/B]
-Commands for Advanced Chat
/acreload
Rcon: acreload

-Commands for CustomColouredPlayers array (these are not for permission based colours):
/msgcolour <R> <G> <B> <A>
/msgcolour <R> <G> <B>
/msgcolour #42b3f4

[B][U]Website Widget:[/U][/B]
If your some what familiar with php i have created a widget that you can include by a simple include / iframe in a already existing website or forum

[B][U]Config Information:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]DiscordWebHookURL - this is where you put the url of your discord webhook that you created in your discord server setting also once you added this set DiscordUseWebHooks to true
[*]ChangeDefaultChatColours - setting this to true will apply LocalChatColour, GlobalChatColour, TribeChatColour, AllianceChatColour for every default member in local / global / tribe / alliance chat
[*]PermissionColours this is a array full of permission elements
[*]Permission is the name of the permission you made in the permissions plugin
[*]ImagePath can be set to a ingame existing image if you dont want to apply a new image over admin / player set it to this "ImagePath":"",
[*]Tag this is a tag that can be placed in front of a specific permission group name if you dont want one set it to "Tag":""
[*]CustomColouredPlayers - this is a array of players by steam id these players will be able to use the name & message colour change command meaning they will be able to use what ever colour they want if you don't want this use permission based colours
[*]ChatMsgColourCommand - the in game chat command used by players to change there message colour when not using permission based colours
[*]ChatNameColourCommand - the in game chat command used by players to change there name colour when not using permission based colours
[/LIST]


[U][B]Image Icons (ImagePath):[/B][/U]
[URL]http://worldgunz.net/AC/Icons.html[/URL]

[U][B]Cross Server Chat using new sockets method Example:[/B][/U]
once purchased and downloaded checkout the example in AdvancedChat/CrossChat Setup Example/ and read the Read Me

[U][B]Cross Server Chat using Rcon Example:[/B][/U]
You must create a CrossChatKey this must be the same in every server you want to include in the list,
You must use rcon ports and have rcon enabled
[IMG]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/437499257704939520/521725403296170019/unknown.png[/IMG]

Resource.message:
New Auth Server
Discord Webhooks (In game Ark chat to discord channel support)

new commands (these are not for permission based colours):
/msgcolour <R> <G> <B> <A>
/msgcolour <R> <G> <B>
/msgcolour #42b3f4
/namecolour <R> <G> <B> <A>
/namecolour <R> <G> <B>
/namecolour #42b3f4

Resource.title: Wild Dino Spawn Control
Resource.message:
/acreload - Seems to be fixed for me (had one or 2 say it did not work)
Discord Webhook potential fix urlencoding now toggleable using "UrlEncoding":false, in the new config by default urlencoding is now off as it causes message bugs at discord,
However you can still use your old config it will still be compatiable
Repeated icons when someone talkins in chat then someone without a icon talks should now be fixed
Unloading / loading the plugin should not crash anymore hopefully (cheat plugins.unload AdvancedChat    or    cheat plugins.load AdvancedChat)
Changes to Auth system to fix random characters displayed
Added a way to turn off the <RichColor and colouring syntax in message if you want just a white message (only works with ChatColour) Example:
[CODE=json]"ChatColour":[
               1.000,
               1.000,
               1.000,
               1
            ],[/CODE]

added ability to override everyone's name colour / dead name colour / icon

Resource.title: Engram Resource Puller FREE
Resource.message:
3.5:
Fixed local chat range to match official now it seems good thanks [USER=4919]@a white guy[/USER] for testing distances ect.
Removed _P from map names when using rcon crosschat
Fixed BestPerformance mode when set to false permissions colours were not working
Fixed BestPerformance mode when set to false steamid coloured names would not work

3.8:
New Beta Cross chat not using rcon, using direct async sockets (a port will be selected via the current math Server Port + CrossChatServerPortOffset, so for example your server port is 7777 and your CrossChatServerPortOffset is 2, the udp port crosschat will use is 7779 so for your second ark server lets say server port is 7780 so your crosschat port will be 7782)
another example:
if you set CrossChatServerPortOffset to 100 and say your server ports match the ones below.
server 1: server port 7777, chat port 7877
server 2: server port 7778, chat port 7878
server 3: server port 7779, chat port 7879
server 4: server port 7780, chat port 7880

your config would look like this for localhost
"CrossChatServers":[
        "127.0.0.1:7877",
        "127.0.0.1:7878",
        "127.0.0.1:7879",
        "127.0.0.1:7880"
      ],

Also please note if you want to connect to a remote machine instead of locally (127.0.0.1 is local and means it will connect to servers on the same machine) 

chat ports are opened, if you are behind a firewall and want to remotely connect to another ark server you will need to open the cross chat port for that server

3.8b:
Fixed a crosschat bug

3.9:
Crash fix

Fixed chat bug where all chat types were being displayed as global
Fixed chat duplication bug with new beta cross chat when reload config was called

Resource.title: Ark Server Remaster
Resource.message:
[B][U]4.8[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]added "DiscordBotLobbyIDS" to config these are the ids of the lobbys your discord bot will relay to in game chat example can be found at #test-discord-bot  
[*]How to get Channel ID? [URL]https://support.discordapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/206346498-Where-can-I-find-my-server-ID-[/URL]
[/LIST]

[B][U]4.7[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Fixed a crash when users spammed discord added !players command to discord bot to list players / online count at discord
[*]Discord Bot Setup Guide [URL]http://arkshop.epidemicnetwork.com/DiscordBotSetup.html[/URL]
[/LIST]

[B][U]4.6[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Warning BETA release
[*]this contains 2 way discord chat you must setup a bot at discord and call it to your server with appropriate perms like sending message ect to create a discord bot make a application here: [URL]https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/[/URL] once you did that then you will notice bots down the left create a bot then grab you bots token press copy and put that into the config
[*]please note im away smiley currently do not send from discord to the server, im releasing this early because i got someone coming around for a few hours so thought id throw it out there and let you all fiddle with it as you please.
[*]should be pretty stable i tested it is working but have not tested runtime reloading or config reloading if you find any issues dont hesitate to contact me
[/LIST]

[*]How to get Channel ID? [URL]https://support.discordapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/206346498-Where-can-I-find-my-server-ID-[/URL]
[/LIST]

[B][U]4.7[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Fixed a crash when users spammed discord added !players command to discord bot to list players / online count at discord
[*]Discord Bot Setup Guide [URL]http://arkshop.epidemicnetwork.com/DiscordBotSetup.html[/URL]
[/LIST]

[B][U]4.6[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Warning BETA release
[*]this contains 2 way discord chat you must setup a bot at discord and call it to your server with appropriate perms like sending message ect to create a discord bot make a application here: [URL]https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/[/URL] once you did that then you will notice bots down the left create a bot then grab you bots token press copy and put that into the config
[*]please note im away smiley currently do not send from discord to the server, im releasing this early because i got someone coming around for a few hours so thought id throw it out there and let you all fiddle with it as you please.
[*]should be pretty stable i tested it is working but have not tested runtime reloading or config reloading if you find any issues dont hesitate to contact me
[/LIST]

[*]this contains 2 way discord chat you must setup a bot at discord and call it to your server with appropriate perms like sending message ect to create a discord bot make a application here: [URL]https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/[/URL] once you did that then you will notice bots down the left create a bot then grab you bots token press copy and put that into the config
[*]please note im away smiley currently do not send from discord to the server, im releasing this early because i got someone coming around for a few hours so thought id throw it out there and let you all fiddle with it as you please.
[*]should be pretty stable i tested it is working but have not tested runtime reloading or config reloading if you find any issues dont hesitate to contact me
[/LIST]

Resource.title: Eggnator
Resource.message:
5.7:
Patch for latest update

5.6:
Disabled Rcon messages if you want rcon info set "BestPerformance": false,

5.5:
Fixed web hook not posting due to DiscordLevelLimit bug

5.4:
/cc - chat command toggle crosschat visibility (for players that dont want spam)
CrossCharLevelLimit - limit the character level of people being able to talk across server
DiscordLevelLimit - limit the character level of people being able to talk to discord
and for discord to ingame chat to prevent spammers install:
[URL]https://dyno.gg/[/URL]
Dyno - Discord platform
Dyno offers a powerful community bot and a place to advertise your server, easy and free.

then create a role for people allowed to talk to the ark server in the discord channel
then add a auto role at dyno to apply the role to new users after x amount of time i added 2880
and to update all your current members and add them to that role type: ?role all rolename
i created this update due to having someone spambot my own server it really helps especially the Dyno for discord you can auto ban people for spamming ect look at the automods section

Resource.title: RateControl
Resource.message:
Plugin prevents flyers to pick up enemy players or dinos.

[B]Configuration:[/B]
[CODE=json]{
  "CanCarryWildDino":false, // Allows flyers to carry wild dinos
  "CanCarryTamedDino":false, // Allows flyers to carry enemy dinos
  "CanCarryPlayers":false // Allows flyers to carry enemy players
}[/CODE]

[B]Console commands:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]AntiCarry.Reload - Reloads config
[/LIST]

Resource.title: Mission Disabler
Resource.message:
[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/lpEI2Az.png[/IMG]

Source Code: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi/tree/master/Ping%20Limiter']Click Here[/URL]

[U][B]Features:[/B][/U]
Kick players over configured ping value
Warning system with configurable amount of strikes
Check delay adjustable

[B][U]Console / Rcon Commands:[/U][/B]
pingreload - Reload the config.json

[B][U]Configuration:[/U][/B]
PingLimit   -   the max amount of ping for a player to have do note during server laggs ping can go up during server spikes so its good to set it about 200-300 range on large servers (40+ active players) but on smaller ones the limit can be lower
TotalPingStrikes   -   the amount of warnings before kicking the player
CheckPingSecondsInteval   -   how often to check everyone's ping in seconds
DisplayWarningsToUsers   -   warn users before they get disconnected
Messages   -   configurable messages / commands here you can alter them, Make sure to change ServerNameHere to your server name

[B][U]Donate[/U][/B]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.

[URL='https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=J6NKDZVCH9RN4&source=url'][IMG]https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/GB/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif[/IMG][/URL]

Resource.title: ARK Webstore Assistant Bot
Resource.message:
[LIST]
[*]Added Support for serverranks.com 
[*]Updated Support for Atlasserverlist.com (With their latest API) 
[*]Added Discord Integration for VoteReward Logging (Public = Less Info, Admin = More Info) 
[*]Added RewardName (Used for Logging to discord) 
[*]Added MaxItemsToReward (To Stop Give Items if a player managed to get lucky and hit a jackpot of getting all items in your config) 
[*]Added MaxDinosToReward (Same as above but for dinos) 
[*]Changed Dino/Item Reward Chance Logic (Should be more random than before) 
[*]General Code Clean-Up (Removed Unused code) 

[B]Note:[/B] This update requires a config update!!
[U](Version 2.2, 2.3 - 2.4 Skipped Since it's Merged with the ARK Version)[/U]
[/LIST]

[*]General Code Clean-Up (Removed Unused code) 

[B]Note:[/B] This update requires a config update!!
[U](Version 2.2, 2.3 - 2.4 Skipped Since it's Merged with the ARK Version)[/U]
[/LIST]

Resource.title: 📡 ARK RCON COMMANDER BOT
Resource.message:
[LIST]
[*]Change: [B](AtlasOnly)[/B] Changed claim method to use the same as ARK Version! 
Reworked: Whole code, structured up, and even cleaner code structure
[*]Reworked: RewardChance values to be percentage-based instead of old logic (100 = 100%, 44 = 44%, and so on [B](Important: UPDATE THIS!)[/B]
[*]Added: Command rewards!
[*]Added: Global Max Item/Dino/Command rewards
[*]Added: Message when the player didn't win any extra rewards
[*]Added: Command to send a manual reward through RCON/Console: vr.givereward <vote-site> <steamid> (for example: vr.givereward ark-servers.net 76561234567891234)
[*]Added: Reload command for Console/RCON vr.reload
[*]Changed: Reload command for Chat from /vrreload to /vr.reload
[*]Changed: Renamed the site-specific value "PointsOnly" to "EnableXtraReward" (Does the same but the opposite value needs to be set, for example, if you had "PointsOnly: false", update this to "EnableXtraReward: true")
[*]Fixed: Chance values like -1 could sometimes break
[*]Fixed: Site-specific values Max"Items/Dinos/Commands" rewards being counted incorrectly
[*]Fixed: Better Discord integration logic
[*]Fixed: Some Discord messages not being sent due to old logic
[*]Improved: Completely reworked the Discord formatting for Discord logging (1 post per claim/site, instead of several)
[*]Improved: Random numbers are now generated for points [U]everytime[/U]
[/LIST]
[B]Note:[/B] This update requires a config update!!

[B]Important:[/B] Due to the time spent fixing and improving this plugin, this will be the last free update containing additional functions. Any functions added after this update will be considered as "Premium" and will require an activation key which can be obtained by purchasing the plugin. Support and bug fixes will still be provided for the free version of the plugin at no additional cost.

Any functions added after this update will be considered as "Premium" and will require an activation key which can be obtained by purchasing the plugin. Support and bug fixes will still be provided for the free version of the plugin at no additional cost.

Resource.title: 📡 ARK RCON COMMANDER BOT
Resource.message:
[LIST]
[*]Change: [B](AtlasOnly)[/B] Changed claim method to use the same as ARK Version! 
Reworked: Whole code, structured up, and even cleaner code structure
[*]Reworked: RewardChance values to be percentage-based instead of old logic (100 = 100%, 44 = 44%, and so on [B](Important: UPDATE THIS!)[/B]
[*]Added: Command rewards!
[*]Added: Global Max Item/Dino/Command rewards
[*]Added: Message when the player didn't win any extra rewards
[*]Added: Command to send a manual reward through RCON/Console: vr.givereward <vote-site> <steamid> (for example: vr.givereward ark-servers.net 76561234567891234)
[*]Added: Reload command for Console/RCON vr.reload
[*]Changed: Reload command for Chat from /vrreload to /vr.reload
[*]Changed: Renamed the site-specific value "PointsOnly" to "EnableXtraReward" (Does the same but the opposite value needs to be set, for example, if you had "PointsOnly: false", update this to "EnableXtraReward: true")
[*]Fixed: Chance values like -1 could sometimes break
[*]Fixed: Site-specific values Max"Items/Dinos/Commands" rewards being counted incorrectly
[*]Fixed: Better Discord integration logic
[*]Fixed: Some Discord messages not being sent due to old logic
[*]Improved: Completely reworked the Discord formatting for Discord logging (1 post per claim/site, instead of several)
[*]Improved: Random numbers are now generated for points [U]everytime[/U]
[/LIST]
[B]Note:[/B] This update requires a config update!!

[B]Important:[/B] Due to the time spent fixing and improving this plugin, this will be the last free update containing additional functions. Any functions added after this update will be considered as "Premium" and will require an activation key which can be obtained by purchasing the plugin. Support and bug fixes will still be provided for the free version of the plugin at no additional cost.

Resource.title: ArkShop Abberation Config
Resource.message:
[B][U]Weekend Rates[/U][/B]

Source: [URL='https://github.com/ownprox/ArkServerApi']Click Here[/URL]

[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]Set multiple multipliers to change over the weekend
[*]Display chatbox text when weekend rates enabled / disabled
[*]Display notification when weekend rate enabled / disabled
[*]Automatically reverts multipliers back to the normal settings after the weekend
[*]Customize message colours
[*]Customize messages
[*]Change MOTD over the course of the weekend
[/LIST]
[B][U]Multipliers Supported:[/U][/B]
[LIST]
[*]XPMultiplier
[*]TamingSpeedMultiplier
[*]HarvestAmountMultiplier
[*]HarvestHealthMultiplier
[*]CraftXPMultiplier
[*]FishingLootQualityMultiplier
[*]BabyMatureSpeedMultiplier
[*]MateBoostEffectMultiplier
[*]MatingIntervalMultiplier
[*]MatingSpeedMultiplier
[*]EggHatchSpeedMultiplier
[*]LayEggIntervalMultiplier
[*]ResourcesRespawnPeriodMultiplier
[*]SupplyCrateLootQualityMultiplier
[*]StructureResistanceMultiplier
[/LIST]
Days have format [0-6]. Where 0 being a Sunday.
 
[B][U]Commands:[/U][/B]
/wrreload               -     Reload Config

[B][U]Installation:[/U][/B]
Please edit config.json before applying
You can leave the config values at 0 that you don't want to change!

[B][U]Donate[/U][/B]
Any donation is much appreciated and very helpful towards the upkeep/creation of the plugins i provide, Plugins take time to create some hours some days and I keep 99% of them open source for others to learn from.

[URL='https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=J6NKDZVCH9RN4&source=url'][IMG]https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/GB/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif[/IMG][/URL]

Resource.title: Item Collector FREE
Resource.message:
[B][COLOR=rgb(44, 130, 201)][SIZE=5]Feel free to join my [URL='https://discord.gg/MTF7hj3']Discord Server[/URL]![/SIZE][/COLOR]


[COLOR=rgb(184, 49, 47)]BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD THIS PLUGIN[/COLOR]
Wildcard has released an option to disable Familysharing in patch 312.74 by putting

[CODE=ini]AllowSharedConnections=False[/CODE]

inside your GameUserSettings.ini - I highly suggest you to use this option instead of using this plugin.[/B]


Prevents people from joining with a familyshared account.

Its good practise to avoid abusing free kits or even bans from a previous account.


To obtain a Steam API Key please [URL='https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey'][B]Click here[/B][/URL]

inside your GameUserSettings.ini - I highly suggest you to use this option instead of using this plugin.[/B]


Prevents people from joining with a familyshared account.

Its good practise to avoid abusing free kits or even bans from a previous account.


To obtain a Steam API Key please [URL='https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey'][B]Click here[/B][/URL]

Resource.title: Lost Island - Extension
Resource.message:
[U][B][SIZE=5][COLOR=rgb(235, 107, 86)]Support for the English version will be soon[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][/U]

[B]What Is SurvivalShop?[/B]
SurvivalShop - a leading plugin for server monetization.


[B]ЧТО ТАКОЕ SURVIVALSHOP?[/B]
- SurvivalShop - простая и эффективная монетизация вашего игрового сервера.


- В базе около 400 товаров, поддерживаются выдача предметов и существ, опыта, услуг
- Картинки для товаров пока в работе, но вы сразу можете загрузить свои
- Система аффиксов, кастомизация товаров и т.д. - все как в Ark-магазине
- Так как Атлас пока имеет проблемы с русскими шрифтами, то по умолчанию установлена английская локаль интерфейса магазина.
  Переключение на русскую осуществляется по команде /ru (значение запоминается для игрока).
- Об ошибках и багах сообщать в телеграм канал


ЧАТ-КОМАНДЫ
------
/shop - показать список предметов в корзине.
!магаз или !м - аналог на русском, показать список предметов в корзине.
/give <номер_товара> - получить предмет или дино купленного в магазине.
!взять <номер_товара> или !в <номер_товара> - аналог на русском, получить предмет или дино купленного в магазине.
/ru - перевести интерфейс магазина на Русский
/en - перевести интерфейс магазина в Английский


[B]УСТАНОВКА:[/B]
- Распаковать плагин в \ShooterGame\Binaries\Win64\AtlasApi\Plugins\.
- Ниже приведен скриншот успешной инициализации плагина.

[URL='https://arkserverapi.com/attachments/con_srv_snap_3-png.720/'][IMG]https://arkserverapi.com/data/attachments/0/720-608acce19f7d3acf62ab03842856de8d.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

- Дальше необходимо отредактировать файлы shop.json в каталоге "\ShooterGame\Saved\Config\Plugins\SurvivalShop\".
- По умолчанию файл пустой. Содержание конфига можно получить на странице сайта, магазина.


[B]Ссылки:[/B]

[B]Demo[/B] [URL]https://atlasdemo.survivalshop.org/[/URL]
[B]Сайт магазина[/B] [URL]http://survivalshop.org[/URL]
[B]Телеграм канал для обсуждения [/B][URL]https://t.me/arksupport[/URL]

[B]Так же отвечаем на вопросы и предложения в данной теме.[/B]

Resource.title: Auto Fill Crop Plots
Resource.message:
SurvivalShop плагин для Atlas, версия alpha 2
———-
- убрана мусорная категория "resources"
- исправлена прокачка дино (опыт увеличен в 100 раз)
- в сообщения веб-хуков добавлены %characterName%, %steamName%, %tribeName%, %steamId%
- добавлен товар "Custom item" в категории "Custom". Это товар-заглушка для прописывания в custom.json.
- добавлены 3 седла (Generic, Tier 2, Tier 3)
- добавлены корабли. Внимание! Корабли появляются в позиции игрока или чуть впереди. Это место должно быть в море! Если забрать корабль находясь в городе, то он сразу попадет в кораблекрушение или сядет на мель.

Resource.title: 📈 STATICS BOT (BIG UPDATE)
Resource.message:
[B][COLOR=rgb(44, 130, 201)][SIZE=5]Feel free to join my [URL='https://discord.gg/MTF7hj3']Discord Server[/URL]![/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]


Prevents people from joining with a familyshared account.

Its good practise to avoid abusing free kits or even bans from a previous account.


[B]Configuration:[/B]
[CODE=json]{
    "APIKey": "https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey",
    "KickMessage": "Familyshared accounts are not allowed on YourServerNameHere, please buy the game or connect with a different account!",
    "Whitelist": [123, 456]
}[/CODE]
Please make sure to change the servername from the KickMessage in config.

To obtain a Steam API Key please [URL='https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey'][B]Click here[/B][/URL]

Resource.message:
Plugin will automatically restart your server when it crashed. It will also attempt to save the world after the crash (no rollbacks anymore).

[B]Notice:[/B]
Make sure you do a regular backups if you want to use save world function.

[B]Configuration:[/B]
[CODE=json]{
  "SaveWorld":true, // Save world after crash (experimental)
  "ShouldRestart":true // Automatic server restart
}[/CODE]

Resource.title: Gacha Feeder
Gacha Crystal Manager
Resource.message:
This plugin will reload the PlayersExclusiveJoinList.txt on a given interval, defaults to 60 seconds.
There is no interaction nor command needed.

[B]Configuration:[/B]
[CODE=json]{
  "Interval":60
}[/CODE]

[B]Commands:
[ICODE]RCON & Console: ExclusiveJoin.Reload[/ICODE] - [/B]This will reload the config.json

[B]Permissions:[/B]
If u want to give a specific Group exclusive join rights, u need to add the Permission [ICODE]ExclusiveJoin.Allow[/ICODE]

You are also able to allow everybody join your server, without restarting it. In this case, you need to add a group named [ICODE]Guest[/ICODE] and give them also the permission [ICODE]ExclusiveJoin.Allow[/ICODE]

Resource.title: Baby Dino Collector
Resource.message:
With this new Versions, you need to have the Permission Plugin installed.

Once you have done this, you can also use Permissions to allow joins.

There are 2 possibilities:
1.) Give the group the permission [ICODE]ExclusiveJoin.Allow[/ICODE] to allow exclusive joins
2.) If you want to allow join for everyone, you need to add [ICODE]ExclusiveJoin.Allow[/ICODE] to a group named [ICODE]Guest[/ICODE]

Resource.title: Discord ArkShop
Resource.message:
This plugin allows you to give only a certain console commands to other players.

[B]Chat Commands:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]/cheat [B]<Console Command>[/B] - Executes console command if player has enough permissions.            Example: [ICODE]/cheat infinitestats[/ICODE].
[/LIST]
[B]Permissions:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]Cheat.[I]<ConsoleCommand>[/I] -  [I]<ConsoleCommand>[/I] is any console command. For example: [ICODE]Cheat.God[/ICODE].
[/LIST]
[B]Dependencies:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]Permissions
[/LIST]
[B]Logs:[/B]
[INDENT]All commands usages will be logged to the Atlas default log file. It's also possible to enable logging to chat.[/INDENT]

For example, if you want to allow all players from group 'Moderators' use only 'KickPlayer' and 'InfiniteStats' commands, you need to grant them these permissions: 'Cheat.KickPlayer' and 'Cheat.InfiniteStats'. [ICODE]Permissions.Grant Moderators Cheat.KickPlayer[/ICODE]
[ICODE]Permissions.Grant Moderators Cheat.InfiniteStats[/ICODE]

Resource.title: Discord ArkShop
Resource.message:
--Ability to change weapon damage values based on wild Dino/tamed Dino/Player

---uses a multiplier meaning this effect scales on top if you have a good blueprint

---does not touch structure damage only increasing/decreasing damage to characters

---supports adding custom weapon names!


how it works?

this plugin will apply a set multiplier of your choosing, let's say you have a rifle that does 100 damage, you set rifle damage multiplier to 2.0, now your rifle will do 200 damage and etc...

cheat WeaponDamageCustomizer.reload -> reloads the config (from game console)

WeaponDamageCustomizer.reload -> reloads config (from RCon)

supports loading and unloading

[SPOILER="Json Config"]
{
    "Debug":true , // if set to true will print weapon name in the console when you shoot anything 
  "WeaponDamageCustomizer": [
    {
      "WeaponName": "Rifle", //the name of the weapon you want to set a multiplier on goes here
      "Multiplier": 100, 
      "ExactMatch": false, //if set to false will run a contains check, if set to true the weapon name has to match the ingame item 1:1
      "IgnoreTier": true, //determines if tier names are looked at or ignored when matching item names
      "Type": 1 // type 0 = multiplier to players, type 1 = multiplier to wild dinos, type 2 = multiplier to tamed dinos, type 3 =  multiplier to all (player,tamed & wild dinos)
    },
     {
      "WeaponName": "Primitive Pistol",
      "Multiplier": 10,
      "ExactMatch": false,
      "IgnoreTier": false,
      "Type": 1
    },
     {
      "WeaponName": "Longneck",
      "Multiplier": 20,
      "ExactMatch": false,
      "IgnoreTier": true,
      "Type": 2
    }
  ]
}
[/SPOILER]

Source Code : [URL]https://github.com/WETBATMAN/WeaponDamageCustomizer[/URL]

Resource.title: ⚙️ DBD Bot Configuration Service
Resource.message:
[B][SIZE=6]Introducing Discord Integrator![/SIZE][/B]
- Seamless discord integration with Ark
(Requires MySQL)

[B][SIZE=5]Features:[/SIZE][/B]
[INDENT][LIST]
[*]Safely Multi-Threaded plugin!
[*]C++ Discord Bot using Qt web sockets
[*]Bot now uses my custom made from scratch Discord C++ API utilizing Qt framework.
[*]Bot is ran by an external application, which is not a plugin, but standalone application.
[*]Bot includes a members search, making finding a certain player a breeze.
[*][IMG]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/709498588132278323/709586385283317790/unknown.png[/IMG]
[*]Works on as many servers as you want
[*]Dual login dupe protection, if a player logs in on two maps with same account, DI will kick them!
[*]Adds player that register with the Bot to the "Discord" permission group, also grants them permission "Discord". (automatically created)
[*]Automatic mute certain words using regexpressions or simple contains check.
[*]Mute players via rcon or console commands.
[*]2way console window for discord, send commands and log them!
[*]Now with ability to run the Discord bot separate from the plugin for max stability! More documentation on this will come, for now feel free to ask on Discord. The files for this is available on Discord.
[*]Seamless management of in-game Discord permission group as players leave/enter the Discord server.
[*]Ability to automatically give Discord users roles based on in-game permission groups they have.
[*]Ability to send a Discord warning message to players as their in-game structures are under attack. (only warns when they are offline. And in private discord message)
[*][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/oj6RAeB.png[/IMG]
[*]Each player can individually set how often a Raid Warning would be sent. Or if it's sent.
[*]Seamless 2-way integration of a Discord text channel with the in-game General channel.
[*]!players on your Discord channel will make the bot post list of online players.
[*][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/L8lAaIw.png[/IMG]
[*]Colorable tags for users.
[*][IMG]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/548476062376656918/553200672099794945/chatcolor.png[/IMG]
[*]Ability to color nicknames and chat messages based on group^^
[*][B]Cross server chat that looks the same on all servers, except [server] tag![/B]
[*][B]Cross server tribe chat! Works automatically.[/B] Requires the same tribe owner on all clustered server. And if added on a new server. Owner must login at least once on each server to connect tribes.
[*]Fully configurable!
[/LIST][/INDENT]

[SIZE=5][B]Config File with explanations:[/B][/SIZE]
This config is a bit outdated. Will update soon.
[SPOILER="Config With Help"]
[CODE=json]
{
  "ServerName": "",               // Must be inique. IF empty it defaults to mapname.
  "MySQL": {
    "UseMySQL": true,                     // Must be true until SqLite is implemented.
    "UseMySQL CrossServerChat": true,     // Cross server chat.
    "CrossServerChatFetchInterval": 0.25, //How often the chat is fetched in seconds.
    "HostAdress": "localhost",
    "Username": "root",
    "Password": "mysql",
    "DataBaseName": "discord_database"    // MYsql database name, plugin will create the tables here.
  },
  "UseAutoPermissionsIngameToDiscord": true, // If true, will automatically set user Discord role, if User has configured permission.
  "AutoPermissionsIngameToDiscord": { // Array that contains the configured auto ingame Permissions to Discord Roles.
    "Admin": [ // Ingame permission group name;
      "834907747594575572" // Discord Role ID;
    ],
    "Vip": [ // You can add multiple ingame permissions.
      "424907728503177216",
      "503177216424907728" // And multiple Discord Roles, as demonstrated here.
    ]
  },
  "DiscordBot": {
    "DiscordBotToken": "PutYourBotTokenHere", // This is your Bot's token. That you get from Discord Developer site.
    "RaidWarningMinInterval": 15, // Minimum amount of minutes between a raid warning sendt to the same user by the Discord Bot.
    "IntegratedChannelID": "0", // The ID of Discord Channel to integrate ingame global chat with. 0 = OFF.
    "IntegratedChannelWebHook": "webhook URL", // Webhook to the channel to post ingame messages too.
    "IngameMsgNameTagFormat": "[Discord]: {}", // The Ingame Name Tag format of Discord->Ingame messages. Default = [Discord]: John Doe
    "IngameMsgMessageFormat": "{}", // Format of Discord -> Ingame messages. Default adds nothing to the message.
    "IngameName_IN_Tribe_Format": "{}  **{}**[{}]:  {}\\n", // The Name Tag format of Ingame->Discord messages. When the speaker is in a tribe. Default = <mapname>   **<name>**[<tribe>]:  <message>
    "IngameName_NO_Tribe_Format": "{}  **{}**:  {}\\n", // The Name no-tribe Tag format of Ingame->Discord messages. When the speaker is NOT a tribe. Default = same as above, without tribe.
    "WebHook_IN_Tribe_Format": "**{}**[{}]:  {}\n",  //only \n here in webhook..
    "WebHook_NO_Tribe_Format": "**{}**:  {}\n"
  }, // PS: Any newline tag except the webhook must be escaped \\n and NOT \n.
  "DiscordBotMessages": { // Messages sent by bot
    "AuthencationMessage": "Thank you for joining our Discord!\\nTo link your discord to the server go in game, and type : /setdiscord {}", // Message sendt by bot after /setdiscord <name> is called by player ingame. Returns random 4digit code.
    "RaidWarning": "RAID WARNING: You're ingame structures are under attack!", // RaidWarning message sent by bot to players that have enabled it.
    "LinkedChannelSpamProtMsg": "<@{}> You must wait {} seconds to write another message." // Spam protection message in integrated channel.
  },
  "Messages": { // Messages sent to player ingame.
    "DiscordActivationCodeSent": "Sent activation code to {}. Please type the activation code received ingame.", // Player used /setdiscord and plugin successfully found the user on the server. Now sending auth code on Discord.
    "DiscordAlreadyLinked": "You are already linked with username:<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">{}</>", // Player is trying to link same Discord twice.
    "DiscordCannotFindUserName": "<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">Cannot find username: {}</>, make sure you have joined our server and that the username provided is correct.", // Cannot find the Discord user provived by player on the server.
    "DiscordLinkFail": "<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">Wrong or expired validation code.</>", // Player wrote wrong auth code.
    "DiscordLinkSuccess": "<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">Successfully linked your Discord!</>", // Successfully linked their Discord.
    "DiscordLinkUsage": "Link you Discord Account with our server and receive benefits like Raidwarning on Discord! <RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">/setdiscord <username></>",
    "DiscordLinkedWith": "You are linked with: {}",
    "DiscordRaidWarningActive": "Raid Warning activated. Message Interval set to: {} minutes", // User has just activated raid warning.
    "DiscordRaidWarningError": "<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">ERROR.</> Correct usage:<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">/raidwarning <minutes></>", // Wrongly formatted /raidwarning command
    "DiscordRaidWarningNotActive": "Raid Warning NOT active. Use /raidwarning <minutes>  to activate!",
    "DiscordRaidWarningNotLinked": "You need to link your Discord with<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">/setdiscord</> before you can use this command.",
    "DiscordRaidWarningOff": "Raid Warning Turned<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">Off.</>", // Message when player sets raid warning OFF.
    "DiscordRaidWarningSet": "Raid Warning set to once each {}. minutes", // Message when player sets raid warning.
    "setDiscordWrongUsage": "<RichColor Color=\"1, 0, 0, 1\">Error.</>Usage:<RichColor Color=\"0, 1, 0, 1\">/setdiscord <full username></>" // Wrong usage of /setdiscord command.
  },
  "UseChatColors": true, //Use ingame chat colors. (name, tag and message)
  "ChatColorsByGroup": { //defined chat colors by groupname.
    "Admins": {
      "Tag": "[Admin]", //Tag shown before nickname. Add space if you want it.
      "R": 0.5, // Message Ged       you can use 255 rgb values directly on all colors, the plugin will calculate ark values.
      "G": 0.8, // Message Green
      "B": 0, // Message Blue.
      "NameR": 0, // name colors
      "NameG": 1,
      "NameB": 0,
      "TagR": 0, // Tag colors
      "TagG": 1,
      "TagB": 1
    },
    "Discord": {
      "Tag": "[Linked]",
      "R": 0,
      "G": 1,
      "B": 1,
      "NameR": 1,
      "NameG": 0,
      "NameB": 0,
      "TagR": 0,
      "TagG": 1,
      "TagB": 0
    }
  },
  "ChatColorsDefault": { //default name colors
    "PlayerName_R": 0.859,
    "PlayerName_G": 0.804,
    "PlayerName_B": 0.09
  }
}
[/CODE]
[/SPOILER]

PS: You can use regular 0-255 RGB values for colors.

[SIZE=6][B]How to install and configure:[/B][/SIZE]
[INDENT=2]You will need a Discord application client id and a bot token. You can follow: [URL='https://github.com/reactiflux/discord-irc/wiki/Creating-a-discord-bot-&-getting-a-token'][B]this guide[/B][/URL] to get one.[/INDENT]
[INDENT=2]   [B]  Do not[/B] use the invite link provided by the guide above, instead use the one below for correct permissions:[/INDENT]
[INDENT=2][B][URL='https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?&client_id=YOUR_CLIENT_ID_HERE&scope=bot&permissions=268758064']https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?&client_id=YOUR_CLIENT_ID_HERE&scope=bot&permissions=268725304[/URL][/B][/INDENT]
[INDENT=2]Posting this link with your client ID should show this:  (Name will be the name you chose)[/INDENT]
[INDENT=2][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/sNWPzci.png[/IMG][/INDENT]
Click authorize and the bot should join your server.
[B]You should manually check that bot has administrator permission[/B].
You also need to make sure that your bot's role is [B]above every other role[/B] in the discord server role config list.
[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/H5OTt7j.png[/IMG]

Now you can start configuring the config.json.

To find Discord Role IDs check [URL='https://discordhelp.net/role-id'][B]this link[/B][/URL]

To find Discord Channel IDs do this:

On Discord, open your User Settings -> Appearance -> Enable Developer Mode.
[IMG]https://camo.githubusercontent.com/b13b3a7bd87a1b9f6a41a31f3d92496df4f34952/68747470733a2f2f6368696b616368692e6e65742f4368696b61636869446973636f72642f77696b692f646973636f72642d746f6b656e2d362e706e67[/IMG]

Right click on the Discord text channel you want the bot to interact with and press "Copy ID".
[IMG]https://camo.githubusercontent.com/caf9c8705f514596cb241816e26e8cab0c349dd9/68747470733a2f2f6368696b616368692e6e65742f4368696b61636869446973636f72642f77696b692f646973636f72642d746f6b656e2d372e706e67[/IMG]
You now have the required ID for the config file!


[B][SIZE=5]Ingame Commands:[/SIZE][/B]
[INDENT][LIST]
[*]/discord - Prints information message.
[*]/raidwarning <minutes>    - Sets the raidwarning to <minutes>  0 = Off.
[*]/setdiscord <username>    - Sets player Discord username, no quotes needed. Can also use Discord ID
[LIST]
[*]Example: /setdiscord woolypenguin#3974
[/LIST]
[*]/setdiscord <authkey>       - Authorizes player with received code.
[/LIST][/INDENT]

[B][SIZE=5]Bot Commands:[/SIZE][/B]
[INDENT][LIST]
[*]!players - Prints player list on server.
[*]!cmd <console command here>               <- this will execute on all servers
[*]!servercmd <DI-servername> <console command>                <- for specific server
[/LIST][/INDENT]
[B][SIZE=5]Console Commands:[/SIZE][/B]
[INDENT][LIST]
[*]cheat di.reload   - Reloads config.
[*]cheat DI.Mute <steamid> <hours> <minutes>  - mutes steamid for X hours Y minutes.
[*]cheat DI.Mute <steamid> <minutes>    - mutes steamid for X minutes.
[/LIST][/INDENT]
[B][SIZE=5]RCON Commands:[/SIZE][/B]
[INDENT][LIST]
[*]cheat di.reload   - Reloads config.
[*]cheat DI.Mute <steamid> <hours> <minutes>  - mutes steamid for X hours Y minutes.
[*]cheat DI.Mute <steamid> <minutes>    - mutes steamid for X minutes.
[/LIST][/INDENT]

[B]Purchase Info:[/B]
After payment join my Discord via "Get Support" button (top right), and send me your hwid. The plugin will print it in console when not authorized.
Please give me at least 1-24 hours to setup hwid info. No new DLL is needed.
This purchase comes with basic support if needed.

[B]Hwid Info:[/B]
- Each license represents a physical machine, so 6 ark servers running on one machine would only need 1 licence, Additional licensee's are required when using multiple physical servers.
- Are you moving server host/upgrading hardware and worried about the hwid? Not a problem send me a pm, here or on discord, with the new hwid and I will have it updated. In most cases within the hour, but it can take up to 24 hours depending upon my availability at that moment.

Plugin works with Atlas. But still needs a way to fetch tribe names. (last needed atlas part)
For questions or more information join my Discord via this link: [URL]https://discord.gg/fGPevkF[/URL]
(This is a temporary link, and unless assigned a role, you automatically leave server when you go offline on discord.)
